# Aleatoric
- [Uncertainty](Uncertainty.qmd) part of the data
- Sensor noise etc
- Simplest noise : additive noise $$f(x) = x^{3}+ \epsilon$$
- $$\epsilon \sim \mathcal{N}(0, \sigma^{2})$$
